description:
Soun Tendo, head of the Tendo Dojo, is overjoyed by the news that Ranma and his father, who have been training in the arts of Kung Fu in China, is returning to fulfill his promise of wedding one of his three daughters.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Che strani tipi sono arrivati dalla Cina...
Chuugoku kara Kita Aitsu! Chotto Hen!!
中国から来たあいつ! ちょっとヘン!!
